name: Growing Research International Limited
memberOrga:
British Ecological Society Agroecology Group
European Society of Agronomy
goal:
By working collaboratively with a diverse range of individuals and organisations, our vision is to develop innovative solutions to some of the world's great challenges.

We seek to create positive change by working in harmony with different groups and communities with the aim of fostering novel ideas and creating an environment where day-to-day work activities are valued and can really make a difference.

Based on years of experience, gained from working in a range of research and business environments, Growing Research International brings you no-nonsense, practical help. We provide a comprehensive service to businesses and organisations to help your ideas bear fruit.

Growing Research International (GRI) is focused on delivering high-quality bid development and a range of bespoke project management and related support services, bringing together multi-disciplinary teams from academia and industry.

Primary areas of expertise are:

agricultural ecology
horticultural crop production
precision farming
botanical science
data analysis and statistics (R programming)
international development
project planning and management
policy analysis
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture
euInitiatives: Contributions to public consultations on H2020 Societal Challenges 2 and 5.
